title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 141 - State Agency Responsibilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 141 - State Agency Responsibilities

State Regulations
§ 141.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability
§ 141.2 - Annual State agency-specific goals
§ 141.3 - Master goal plan
§ 141.4 - State agency master goal plan submission procedure
§ 141.5 - State agency master goal plan review
§ 141.6 - State agency compliance reporting
§ 141.7 - State agencies' good faith efforts
§ 141.8 - State agency remediation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 141

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 313[2], [2-a], 313-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
